name: Liam's Ballad
desc:
[Version 1]

A clear bottle with a note that contains the deeds of someone named Liam and a strange drawing on the back.

[Version 2]

A clear bottle with a note that contains the deeds of someone named Liam and a strange drawing on the back. You followed the clues on the paper and found the treasure they left behind.

desc.text:
Liam once wore bright clothes and laughed happily.
Liam once wrote songs without fear of taboos and mocked the hypocrites.
Liam will no longer sing out loud or act so proud.
But Liam will not stoop to beg.
And Liam will not bend or compromise.
Liam and his music will travel far and fly high.
And in a vast and empty land, Liam will continue to sing.
If you have heard this song, friend, will you, too, never give up?
If you share those ideals, <color=#37ffff>please retrieve Liam's pride</color> ,
And he shall reward you.
